Name: 大逃亡专家 Escape Expert
About the game: How about this game? This is a Indie Game developed by one person except art part. The game is developing and it is not completed, not final. I make this game depended on my design only, maybe it is not better than other 3A big game, but its gameplay is really different with others. The new multiplayer mode has new map and new gameplay for this game, it is now available to play. Gameplay concept This is an open map escape game, you are an escape expert who helping clients to escape, credit is your life, don't ask the customer's identity, purpose and goods, finish task then receive money and improve reputation only. Anyone could send request to you, such as helping bank robbers to escape, helping a girl to escape marriage. Work is not always simple to escape to exit point, you may become city wanted by the police, they will block all exit ways, you need to prepare enough food, fuel, energy, tools, etc to survive during these wanted days. The gameplay is not like THE MOST WANTED or GTA, it is a new concept, you can’t just hide and remove the stars then back to your life in this game. There are constraints such as food, vigor, gasoline and other resources. For example, you need to go outside to buy food carefully when you are in wanted, if someone saw you, he would call the polices to arrest you, there is a risk even sleeping. In this situation, you have to survive day by day to finish your work. Multiplayer Gameplay concept In this Multiplayer mode ,player can act Escape Expert or join the Polices，it support maxmun 20 players. As Escape Expert , your task is to search and find VIPs and survive until evacuated. If you was arrested, your teammates can try to save him from the prison, but it is very danger. If all of you were arrested, your mission will be fail. As Police, you need to find and arrest all the Escape Expert before they finished their tasks, but you have to know that polices are the supporting roles in this game, you won't be easy to make it. Map in Multiplayer mode is about 7 time bigger than the map in Single player mode, its land area is about 4000M*4000M as a island. It is more beautiful than single player mode. More details: Features in this game: Open world big map Buying new vehicle Sightseeing various landscape Random elements Various Missions Reputation system Money system Gasoline, food, endurance etc. collecting supply Survival elements Weapon system Various interesting trigger events Gamephone functions, such as chatting with AI Mulitplayer mode has new gameplay can act police in Mulitplayer mode (There are many other features we are developing...) About Us QQ Group: 376271108（游戏圈：推好游招队友） WeChat and QQ Official Accounts（微信和QQ公众号）：UNGaming（not only this game，we care for all fun games）
Developers: 刘俊亨(Junheng Liu),UNGamingOrg游戏组织玩家
